references.reason: This paper provides a detailed technical report on GPT-4, a state-of-the-art large language model, whose performance is benchmarked in the study.
This paper is foundational to the field, establishing the capability of large language models to perform well on tasks with limited examples, a key concept relevant to the benchmark.

references.paper_title: BabyAI: First steps towards grounded language learning with a human in the loop
references.reason: This paper introduces BabyAI, one of the benchmark environments used, allowing for evaluation of grounded language learning abilities in a controlled setting.
This paper introduces NetHack Learning Environment (NLE), a challenging benchmark environment used in the study, that tests long-term planning and reasoning capabilities.

references.paper_title: Emergent abilities of large language models
references.reason: This paper explores the emergent abilities of large language models, highlighting capabilities relevant to the agentic tasks evaluated in the benchmark.
